title: Beyond the Horror: 1984 Episode 5
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Night Stalker and Jingles driving off like Thelma and Louise - loves it

Y’all the noise was better, but started again the second Murder Motel joined and started moving all over the place, pleeeeeeeease hold still, please please put down your phone, I reeeeeeeally want to be able to watch these live-streams but it’s impossible with all the constant disruption and distraction. #PutDownThePhone

I love the fight between donna and montana. Beautiful ❤️❤️also a 9 it was really well done to me for ep.4, sorry editing again and a 9.5 for ep. 5, although you know montana, it made me say oh whats next.

This was the very 1st season of AHS, that I wasn't at all excited about and really anticipating. I love horror films & tv shows. But, have never been that big into slasher films, where it's just someone running around killing people, and seeing the different ways they each die. I love horror, that has a supernatural element, like witches, demons, vampires, ghosts, etc. But, I still gave this season a chance and have been watching it. The first few episodes didn't interest me that much. But, the last 2 episodes have changed my mind. Now, that it turns out that the characters are ghosts, I'm suddenly totally into it!
The ghosts should get revenge on Margaret by killing her
